name: git-documentdb-plugin-remote-nodegit
description: GitDocumentDB plugin for remote connection using NodeGit

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && npm run lint && tsc --project src/tsconfig.json
scripts.doc: npm run build && npm run api-extractor && npm run crlf
scripts.mocha: rm -rf test/database* && npx cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha
scripts.mocha-unit: rm -rf test/database* && npx cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.mocha.json mocha --retries 0 --no-parallel
scripts.test: npm run rm-test-db && npx nyc npm run mocha "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && npm run rm-test-db
scripts.test-noretry: npm run rm-test-db && npx nyc npm run mocha-noretry "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && npm run rm-test-db
scripts.test-serial: npm run rm-test-db && npx nyc npm run mocha-serial  "test/**/*.test.ts" "test_intg/**/*.test.ts" && npm run rm-test-db

author: Hidekazu Kubota
